h2_title: Emerald-Armed Mantis Boss Fight and Guide
content: The mantis will now become quite erratic with its movements, flipping all around the stomach. Immobilize will help out with this, but so will the Plantain Fan, which will push the Mantis back to a part of the stomach and pin it there for you to attack. It will also stop it from being able to fly too much in the air.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Emerald-Armed_Mantis.md', within the main section titled 'Emerald-Armed Mantis', specifically from the subsection 'Emerald-Armed Mantis Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The mantis will now become quite erratic with its movements, flipping all around the stomach. Immobilize will help out with this, but so will the Plantain Fan, which will push the Mantis back to a part of the stomach and pin it there for you to attack. It will also stop it from being able to fly too much in the air.
